forecast.name: Tonight

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow after 10pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. Southeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday

forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 8am, then rain and snow likely. Cloudy. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 39 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. North wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
